snippet: The new location, opening Wednesday, is larger and more elaborate than the original No. 7 in Fort Greene, but will have a sandwich menu that's similar to the one at the No. 7 Sub shop in the Ace Hotel in Manhattan.
abstract: The new location, opening Wednesday, is larger and more elaborate than the original No. 7 in Fort Greene, but will have a sandwich menu that's similar to the one at the No. 7 Sub shop in the Ace Hotel in Manhattan.

headline.main: No. 7 Sub Gets Bigger in Greenpoint
